name: Azan - Maduro Natural - Campa√±a
additionalNotes: The Azan Maduro Natural is a limited edition line. The wrapper is a rare corojo maduro grade 7 and 8 (cut of the leafs) that has taken over 22 months processing by a team led by the tobacco expert Mr. Vicente Castillo. The Nicaraguan filler has been specially selected to create a perfect balance in a strong cigar that not only will give you a great pleasure to smoke now but it is a cigar that has a great aging potential.
